descriptionHTML:
Experience an excellent time piece for your smartwatch. Courser Classic watch face will allow you to go the course and track time like none other. The watch face boasts many complications such as multiple bezels and a stopwatch. The bezels rotate and work as they would on a classic watch. Connect to Google Calendar, read detailed weather information and more. Download courser classic watch face for your android wear smartwatch clock today!

Instructions for using the watch, including the bezels and the stopwatch, are included in the app for download.

• Enhanced time reading experience
• Smooth hour, minute and second hands
• Real working rotating bezels
• Google Calendar sync
• Detailed weather information
• Analog stopwatch complication
• Multiple bezel complications
• Timer bezel
• Stopwatch bezel
• Compass Bezel
• Second timezone bezel (with added 24 hour timezone hand)
• Displays missed calls
• Day, date, and month
• steps counter
• Millions of color combinations
• lock bezel and stopwatch touches separately

This is the best android wear watch face for your smartwatch wearable. It works well with round or square android wear smartwatches.

recentChanges: - Made missed calls and weather display black for increased readability.  Made weather display scrollable.
- Updated weather app to fit round devices
